brandingLogo.description: The branding logo as a data URI (e.g. data:image/png;base64,...).

directorySyncToken.description: The token for directory sync authentication.

disallowPasswordSignin.description: Whether to disallow password signin. (Except workspace admins)

disallowSignup.description: Disallow self-service signup, users can only be invited by the owner.

enableAuditLogStdout.description:
Whether to enable audit logging to stdout in structured JSON format.
 Requires TEAM or ENTERPRISE license.

enableMetricCollection.description: Whether to enable metric collection for the workspace.

enforceIdentityDomain.description: Only user and group from the domains can be created and login.

externalUrl.description: The external URL is used for sso authentication callback.

inactiveSessionTimeout.description: The session expiration time if not activity detected for the user. Value <= 0 means no limit.

maximumRoleExpiration.description: The max duration for role expired.

watermark.description:
Whether to display watermark on pages.
 Requires ENTERPRISE license.
